channel.title: JavaFX on Wouter Brunenberg
channel.description: Recent content in JavaFX on Wouter Brunenberg

item.title: Drawing Application
item.author: wouter.brunenberg@hotmail.com (Wouter Brunenberg)
item.description: Overview ğŸ—ºï¸ When school ended for the year and I had some spare time, I chose to start building a drawing/editing app using JavaFX. I had just learned about this technology and was curious to see how far I could get with this somewhat outdated technology. After setting up the basic features and tools like the pencil, brush, paint bucket, and eraser, I stopped working on the project. I decided it would be better to start exploring other technologies.
